Key:
Ahhh. What a nice, clear blue sky. A perfect day to
practice.

(I'm at Raizen High School on my day off. The whole
place is empty, but I came here to practice as much
as I could.)

Shido Itsuka #4, the ace of the baseball team...
I'm still not used to this reputation. But that's more
of a reason to become a man worthy of that name.

(Despite my club being on break, I came all the way
to school to practice. I guess I'm a baseball nut,
after all.)

But it's pretty nice being in an empty field. So open.
I guess it was worth coming out on my day off.
All right, I'll start my warm-up.
Hehe... Hold on just a moment, Shido.
Request. Wait a moment, Shido.

Those voices. Kaguya and Yuzuru, the managers....
What are you guys doing here? We have today off.

What a foolish question. We are the right hands of the
heroic competitor. We will always be by your side at
any given time.

Response. Since we're the managers, we've come to
help you, Shido. Kaguya was eavesdropping and heard
you tell the teacher you were going to practice.
Hey! Yuzuru, you were listening too!

Rebuttal. Yuzuru was just trying to stop Kaguya.
Please do not put the blame on me.
But you were listening, too!

(The two started to bicker with each other. This was
an everyday sight. It was also a signal that the
baseball team could relax.)

Okay, I get it. I see. Thanks for coming out on your
day off.

Correction. Yuzuru is just happy to spend time with
Shido.
Hey, no fair! I wanted to be with Shido, too.

Hahaha. Well if that's the case, I guess I can have
you guys help me with practice.

(So I started my training with the two managers ready
to help.)

(God knows what the other members are going to
do when they find out that I had the two adorable
managers to myself all day...)
I'm going to keep today a secret.
What's the matter, Shido?

Oh, nothing. Oh, that's right. Listen, you guys. Don't
tell the others about today, all right?
Oh, is that so? I understand.
Understood. That's preferable to us as well.

This is a relentless pursuit between Yuzuru and
myself.
Agreed. No need to tell the others.
Did you say something?
N-Nothing!
Emphasis. I'm sure you misheard.

I-I see. Then can you help with getting the equipment
out? I know it'll be hard to do all at once, so maybe
we can divide it up?
Understood. So what do you want us to get out?

Hm. Well, I want to practice batting, so a lot of
balls.
Understood. Shido, please head over to the grounds.

All right. I'm ready. I was going to ask if those two
could pick up the balls, but...

Hey, you two. Um, shouldn't you be changing? It's hard
to say this, but if you run around like that, I think
a lot of things will show... Like your underwear.

Hehehe. It's fine. That's not a big deal. I figured it'd
happen, so I'm wearing spandex shorts underneath!

Reveal. Excellent functionality, as you can see. No
problem.
O-Okay!

(I know they're wearing shorts, but I don't know what
to do when they flip their skirts up like that. Aren't
they embarrassed?)

(If they're fine, I guess it's okay. But the curves
from their hips is pretty apparent... it's kind of
poisonous to the eye.)

Hehe... Seems like it's working. So it's true that
sportsmen are weak against spandex. I called it.
I'm not embarrassed of the Spandex Tactic!

Correction. Yuzuru was the one to come up with the
name. Kaguya just rode the bandwagon.

H-Hey, I was the one that gathered the information!
Y-Yuzuru, your spandex is super lovely and it's so
not fair... but I can't give you Shido!

Agreed. Kaguya, although you may look like an angel
in your spandex, I can't surrender this battle.
Shido's heart will be won by Yuzuru.

...Seems like they're talking, but I can't hear what
they're talking about. Hey you guys, can I start now?
Yeah! Come at me!
Request. Please start.
All right then, here I go!

(The practice grounds are relatively smaller, and I
could see the balls fly left and right.)

That's amazing. They're picking up every single ball
and returning them to me.

(I asked them to pick up the balls, but not catch them
like they're defense. But it seemed like Kaguya and
Yuzuru were competing and running after the balls.)

It makes me smile watching them. I almost want to
hit the balls so they can catch them... But that
spandex just won't get out of my head.

(Ngh... What am I thinking of during such a wholesome
sport? Get out of here, corrupted thoughts!)

Hehe... Seems like the plan is effective. I can tell
even from here that Shido is blushing from ear to ear.

Agreed. It seems like it is working. But... well...
wouldn't you say it's embarrassing for us as well?

Embarrassment. Shido's piercing hot gaze seems like
it's following us...

D-Don't say that! I'm getting embarrassed, too. Ah...
but Shido seems to be really curious.

Taunt. Are you embarrassed, Kaguya? You can retire,
if you'd like!

I'm totally not embarrassed! I-I'm totally fine! I can go
for another 100... No, 1,000 balls!
Piece of cake. I can go for 2,000.
Bring it on!

(Hmm... I still can't make out what they're saying,
but I can tell they're blushing.)
So they are embarrassed. Jeez, I told them!

(Hmm, what should I do? This isn't good for
practicing...)

Seems like they're excited about other things, so I
don't think they'd stop even if I told them to.

Fine. I guess I'll have to save them. They're both so
stubborn. I'll have to give a random excuse or they
won't budge.
(So what do I do?)
Ask them to go run an errand.
Pretend to be tired and ask for a massage.
All right guys, bring it in!

(I called out to them, and the two stopped bickering
and gathered next to me.)
What's the matter, Shido? We just started practice.
Agreed. We can still continue.

Yeah I know, but I totally messed up. I can't continue
practicing like this.

Something serious enough that you can't continue
practicing?
Question. What was the mistake?

Hm, well... I forgot to go shopping. I didn't bring
anything to eat or drink for lunch.
...Pfft. Haha.

Shido... You were so serious, I wasn't sure
what you were going to say.

Roger. If you're hungry, we have no other choice. It
is a manager's job to manage the players' condition.
(So glad. Seems like they softened up a little.)

Good, you guys are laughing. It seemed like there was
so much tension between you two, it was starting to
bother me.
Oh... I see. Sorry for the trouble. I apologize.
Apologies. We have failed as managers.

Oh, hold on now. I was the one that let it get to me.
I just want you two to always be smiling and full of
energy.
That's where we players get our energy from.
(...Man, that was so lame of me to say.)

Well let's go shopping. I can't do anything while I
wait, so I'll go with you.

Okay, then let's compete while we shop. Yuzuru, I'm
going to win this one.
Understood. Bring it on!

(So it's going to end up like this after all? But it
seems like they're smiling more than earlier. Oh,
well.)
Shido, hurry! We're going to leave you behind.
Agreed. Consider this part of your training.
Yeah, I'm coming!
(I ran after my two cute managers.)
All right guys, bring it in!

(I called out to them, and the two stopped bickering
and gathered next to me.)
What's the matter, Shido? We just started practice.
Agreed. We can still continue.
Yeah, but I went all out and I'm already tired.

Disbelief. You're tired? But you haven't even
practiced for an hour.

If we're not even tired, it's hard to believe that
you'd be, Shido. If you're saying that to look out for
us...

Oh, wait, wait. Well I wanted to ask you guys to give
me a massage. I'm sure it'll be good practice just in
case the other members get injured right?
I see...
Agreed. That's interesting.

Hehe... A new page will be added to the history of
our battles.
Return fire. I accept your challenge.

(All right. I was able to shift their attention. If I let
their spandex distract me, I won't last. I'm glad to
have something to divert their focus.)
All right, Shido. Let me start my shiatsu.
Thanks, Kaguya. If you could do my shoulders...
Hehe... Leave it to me. Here I go, Shido!
(Oh. I'm starting to have a bad feeling about this.)
Erupt, Lightning Finger!

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
H-Hey, Kaguya—GAH! Stop, STOP!
Wh-What's the matter, Shido? Does it hurt?

W-Well it's not about the pain. Didn't you hear some
kind of explosion right now?! I thought my shoulder
exploded.
S-Sorry, I seemed to have gone overboard...

I-I see. You haven't massaged much before, huh
Kaguya? Got it, I'll teach you later. But now...
Affirmative. That means that Yuzuru will win.
Th-That isn't set yet.

Yuzuru, you seem confident. Then, where should I
ask next... Since my shoulders are kind of sore right
now, could you do my legs?

Understood. Shido, please sit down. I am commencing
the massage.

Good. Yuzuru seems to be capable. I think I can trust
her.
...Open eyes!

(...Oh, I understand now. This isn't going to end
well.)
Y-Yuzuru. Actually let's st―!
Confidence. It'll be fine. Here I go. Sei-yah!
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! The―!

(After I regained consciousness, I taught them how
to massage non-violently, and our practice ended. I
seriously am glad the others weren't here for this...)
